name: Hitty Mouse Travels the World
description:
A Slash 'em Up Roguelikelike.

Join Hitty Mouse as you beat up your enemies with various weapons including cheese, cotton swabs, and triangles. Visit 8 locations of possibly recycled content. Try not to die, but you'll die anyway.

Created for GameBoy Jam 5.

Made with Stencyl.

While this is an innocent game, you can check out my not-so-innocent self at...
